page.title: 20TOURISM
page.content: Most people had come from other parts of England. They travelled by Coach, car bus, train, ferry or hovercraft. Many tourists were not staying in the West Wight, they were on day trips. Most people liked the West Wight's beautiful countryside, the sea, and the uncommerciallised beaches. The weather was bad so many people said they didn't like the wind and rain so no one had been swimming. The things people didn't like were the stones and the buildings close to the sea. Most tourists didn't want to go home.
